Excited by the discovery of a seemingly powerful and useful object, Ash started to run into Pallet town towards Professor Oak's lab. He figured he might get some useful information on how the coin works and how to properly use it.(Not letting anyone know what he discovered mind you.)

As he rushes around the corner Ash barely catches a woman turning from the other direction at the same time and the two collide. Ash’s face planting into the tall woman’s soft chest before falling back onto the ground.

The long flowing golden blonde hair, Her jet black outfit, and mature beautiful womanly body. This was none other than the champion of the Sinnoh region, Cynthia.

“Oh no trouble, I was a young energetic trainer myself. Just be sure to practice a bit of caution in the future.” Cynthia smiles as she helps Ash get back up onto his feet.

“Well I was in the region and I thought I’d come by Professor Oak’s Lab to catch up and see how his studies are going. Sadly it appears the Lab is closed for the moment.”

info.description:
My second Hypnosis-Based story. This time in Pokemon! Please check out my other stories (And yes, I plan to make more!)

RWBY: https://www.writing.com/main/interact/item_id/2168279-Hypnotic-Adventures-in-RWB...

Rules:
- No Death, Gore, BDSM, Vore, Scat, peeing, Malesub, M/M or Pregnancy.
- Always leave a "something else" option.
- Please refrain from using small chapters UNLESS it's a choice chapter.
- Don't end a story-line unless there is a VERY good reason

I may add more rules later if I think of them but for now... have fun! Feel free to add! Additions are more than welcome!
